thread.title: Reader: Charging for New Lane on I-70 is Bullsh*t!
thread.title_full: Reader: Charging for New Lane on I-70 is Bullsh*t! | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Reader: Charging for New Lane on I-70 is Bullsh*t!
text:
Colorado Department of Transportation Our post about the approval of rates for the new toll lanes on part of I-70 generated some strong reactions among readers.
One reason: The top price, which had previously been announced as $30, will actually cost drivers $40 thanks to a $10 surcharge.
Related Stories Top Price for New I-70 Toll Lane Coming Soon: $40 Plenty of folks feel the fees for the lanes, which are expected to open in December, are excessive.
This one, however, thinks charging anything for them is wrong, based on his experience in another state. Here's what he had to say.
Ray Koren writes:
This is BULLSHIT. In Massachusetts you can use the shoulder or "Breakdown Lanes" for Free during peak traffic. A big Fuck Off to whoever is charging a fee for this. Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
